thread.title: New Research Reveals America’s ‘Top 10 Buggiest Cities’
thread.title_full: New Research Reveals America’s ‘Top 10 Buggiest Cities’

title: New Research Reveals America’s ‘Top 10 Buggiest Cities’
text:
Subscribe New Research Reveals America’s ‘Top 10 Buggiest Cities’ Thumbtack has released research that found residents of Phoenix, Kansas City, and several Texas cities are the most bug-ridden in the U.S., requesting the highest proportion of bug- and pest-removal per capita. October 14, 2015 
Thumbtack has released research that found residents of Phoenix, Kansas City, and several Texas cities are the most bug-ridden in the U.S., requesting the highest proportion of bug- and pest-removal per capita. For more about America’s top 10 buggiest cities, visit https://www.thumbtack.com/blog/buggiestcities/ . For this analysis, researchers reviewed requests on Thumbtack for pest-removal services -- such as pest control, bed bug extermination, outdoor pesticide application, and termite and pest inspection -- in 159 of the largest metro areas in the U.S. You can read more about the methodology on Thumbtack Journal , and find out which cities have the distinction of being the least buggy.
